title: Love In War
alternative_title: 他人にはダメって言う人がやりがちな事 ; Naysayers Are a Far Too Common Occurrence for Others ; Love In War ; Tanin ni wa Damette Iu Hito ga Yarigachi na Koto
status: 他人にはダメって言う人がやりがちな事 ; Naysayers Are a Far Too Common Occurrence for Others ; Love In War ; Tanin ni wa Damette Iu Hito ga Yarigachi na Koto
description:
Description :
        A story about two lovers in war by Sino Sakisaki'Love in War' is not actually the name of this series as this currently does not have a name since the author just does a bunch of twitter comics. I also thought it be kinda funny

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 4: Flag-Makers Who Even Cause Trouble For The Enemy Forces
